spec_data.Name: perl-Hardware-Vhdl-Parser
spec_data.Description:
This module defines the complete grammar needed to parse any VHDL code. By
overloading this grammar, it is possible to easily create perl scripts
which run through VHDL code and perform specific functions.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:20:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Complete grammar for parsing VHDL code using perl
